prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a shadowy form and glowing eyes that embodies stealth and mystery.
I want a small, dark Pokemon that has an eerie presence, perfect for haunting forests at night.
Generate a mischievous ghost Pokemon that can blend into shadows and surprise its opponents.
Make a Pokemon with a humanoid shape that has a playful yet elusive personality, perfect for sneaky tactics.
Imagine a ghostly creature with a smoky appearance that can float through the air, causing mischief.
Design a mysterious Pokemon that uses its abilities to confuse and deceive other creatures in its environment.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in dark places and is known for its playful yet elusive nature.

distinctive_features: Two wispy appendages on top of its head
